text: "Unable to infer object type from: event", means that you don't have the correct name for your object type, so instead of using "event" <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/event/2-7111007/associations/contact/0-1/event_to_contact> in this api call do you want to use the numerical id it's going to start with 2- and it can be found in the url of the custom object list page from the ui
<@U01QVR44MEY> Hi Carter, I am using the Id starting with 2 already. its in the request as object id.
So I am using: Object type = event, Object ID: id of the object event, etc.
